cvm_pci_scatter_resp_t Struct Reference

#include <cvm-pci-dma.h>

Detailed Description

Core: Scatter response information This structure is passed by application when calling a scatter response API.

Definition at line 261 of file cvm-pci-dma.h.

Data Fields

cvmx_resp_hdr_t orh
 The response header for the instruction.
uint64_t status
 The status to be returned to host.
uint32_t remote_segs
 Number of entries in the scatter list.
uint8_t pcie_port
 PCIe port to use to read scatter list and send response.
uint8_t reserved [3]
 Reserved.
octeon_sg_entry_t * sg_entry
 The scatter list that contains the host output buffer addresses.

Field Documentation

cvmx_resp_hdr_t cvm_pci_scatter_resp_t::orh

The response header for the instruction.

Ignored for cvm_dma_send_scatter_response_direct() since ORH is part of response data for direct API.
